code: import{observer,inject}from"mobx-react";import{useState}from'react';import Card from"../../components/Card/Card";import style from"./slider.module.scss";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faCircleLeft,faCircleRight}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Slider=inject('wordStore')(observer(_ref=>{let{wordStore}=_ref;const[translated,setTranslated]=useState(true);const[count,setCount]=useState(0);const[cardCount,setCardCount]=useState(0);if(!wordStore.words&&wordStore.words.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."});};const object=wordStore.words&&wordStore.words[count];if(!object){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."});}function handleClickCount(){setCardCount(cardCount+1);}function showTranslation(){setTranslated(false);handleClickCount();}function handleClickPrev(){let copyCount=count;if(copyCount===0){setCount(wordStore.words.length-1);}else{setCount(copyCount-1);}setTranslated(true);}function handleClickNext(){let copyCount=count;if(copyCount===wordStore.words.length-1){setCount(0);}else{setCount(copyCount+1);}setTranslated(true);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style.slider,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:style.button_prev,onClick:handleClickPrev,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCircleLeft})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{english:object.english,transcription:object.transcription,russian:object.russian,index:object.index,translated:translated,showTranslation:showTranslation},object.index),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:style.button_next,onClick:handleClickNext,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCircleRight})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style.text,children:["Cards studied: ",cardCount]})]});}));export default Slider;
